polyline.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-linejoin: bevel; fill: rgb(162, 132, 194); stroke-width: 17px;
stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-linejoin: bevel; fill: rgb(131, 193, 166); stroke-width: 17px;

line.style: fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 17px; stroke-dasharray: 30px;
